answers.answer: I have 8 weeks to go starting thursday. I'm ready to see my son but nervous because I haven't done this in 14+ years.
Wow. I'm a ftm and I'm so scared. Idk how I'm even going to know if I go into labor or anything.. I don't know how a contraction will feel..
I'm going to be 32 on Sunday! I'm scared lol I forgot how the contractions feel lol my daughter is 6 already so I feel like I'm starting all over
Ill be 32 weeks in a few days I have 61 days left! Wow cant believe it! We're so close!
I ll b 32 weeks on Friday. Some days i feel strong and some days i m scared thinking of the final time. I m a ftm too n these past days i hav been confused all d time :-/
I'll be 32 this Friday, not feeling my best since they told me I have gestational diabetes. Hope it all goes well.
I will be 32weeks tomorrow too... too excited n worried at the same time... :)

My daughter Is due may 4th! Im so excited! Its my second daughter, the first one was born may 1st 2010. Shes so excited to be a big sister to a baby sister and i cant wait to see their bond! Good luck to you other mommies!! May is gonna be an exciting month!
Me too and I'm really excited, I'm ready to hold her in my arms
I know how exciting. Our baby is very active. Trying to kick its way out! Lol. I know what you mean txtaurus - my daughter is 9yo so it all feels new again xoGood luck everyone.

question: I turn 32 weeks tomorrow and I'm so excited. 8 weeks to go (: anyone else due around the time I am.?? (: how do you guys feel.?? (:
title: 8 months.!!
